caption.p: Sequence alignment of 2019-nCoV M pro with SARS-CoV M pro. (A) The secondary structure of peptidase in the alignment were assigned using Schrodinger maestro 2020-1. The N3 peptide binding residues for M pro of 2019-nCoV are highlighted as red coloured box. (B) 2019-nCoV M pro domains (domain-I: blue, domain-II: yellow, domain-III: red and loop: pink, between domain I and II and binding), with N3 peptide: green.
